articles.title: Putin Is Right: The War in Ukraine Is Partly America's Fault - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The U.S. was totally seduced by the money flowing out of Russia and helped Putin become all-powerful. The last year has shown us the consequences.
articles.content: Vladimir Putin did not appear out of a vacuum to birth a gangster state, invade Ukraine, roil the planet in chaos, and order his hobgoblins on Russian television to incessantly threaten the world wit… [+7986 chars]

articles.title: Ideal cardiovascular health can help people live longer, finds Chinese Medical Journal study - EurekAlert
